meanings.definition: Writers of literary works, especially essays and fiction.
meanings.sent1: The belletrists gathered to discuss their latest stories.
meanings.sent2: Many belletrists enjoy exploring different genres in their writing.
meanings.sent3: The belletrists' stories were so captivating that even the birds stopped to listen.
meanings.sent4: Her pen danced across the paper like a belletrist painting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The belletrists' words painted vivid pictures in the readers' minds.

meanings.definition: Those who excel in the art of writing creatively.
meanings.sent1: As a belletrist, she effortlessly weaved tales that captivated her audience.
meanings.sent2: The group of belletrists shared tips on enhancing their storytelling skills.
meanings.sent3: The belletrists' creativity knew no bounds, inspiring others to write.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a treasure trove of ideas, like a belletrist with endless stories to tell.
meanings.sent5: The belletrists' imaginative flair brought life to their characters.

meanings.definition: Individuals who are skilled in producing literary works.
meanings.sent1: The belletrists' dedication to their craft shone through in their writing.
meanings.sent2: Many aspiring writers looked up to the belletrists for guidance.
meanings.sent3: The belletrists' pens were like magic wands, creating worlds with each stroke.
meanings.sent4: She approached writing like a belletrist sculpting words into art.
meanings.sent5: The belletrists' expertise in storytelling was unmatched.
